login.title: Tracker Dashboard
login.prompt: Sign in with your Yandex account to continue

dashboard.whatToDo: What would you like to do?
dashboard.chooseAction: Choose an action to manage your tracker configurations
dashboard.exportConfigDescription: Download queue configurations as a .ytexp file for backup or migration
dashboard.importConfigDescription: Upload and apply queue configurations from a .ytexp file

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.message: The application encountered an unexpected error. Please refresh the page to try again.

toast.errorAutoDismiss: This message will auto-dismiss in {{seconds}} seconds
toast.exportFilenameError: Export failed: Filename could not be determined from response headers.
toast.exportHeaderMissing: Export failed: Content-Disposition header missing in response.
toast.importNoConfigsFound: Import file processed, but no configurations were found or applied.
toast.selectQueues: Please select at least one queue to export.
toast.selectFile: Please select a .ytexp file to import.
toast.selectOrgForImport: Please select an organization for import.
toast.selectOrgToViewQueues: Please select an organization to view available queues for export.
toast.selectOrgForImportTarget: Please select an organization where you want to import the configurations.
toast.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

queueSelector.label: Queues
queueSelector.noQueues: No queues found for this organization.

exportSection.title: Export Configuration
exportSection.selectQueuesPrompt: Choose which queues to include in your export
exportSection.warningSelectQueue: Please select at least one queue to export

importSection.title: Import Configuration
importSection.uploadPrompt: Select a .ytexp file containing the configurations to import
importSection.noteOverwrite: Existing configurations with the same key will be overwritten
importSection.noteBackup: Make sure to backup current configurations before importing
importSection.noteLargeFile: Import process may take several minutes for large files
importSection.warningSelectFile: Please select a file to import
